html:
The weather in Smallenske

PhotoVideo
  • All news tapes
  • News
  • Country and world
  • Society
  • Sport
  • Business
  • Subscription
  • 100 years old!

Smolenska and the field. Main developments in the city

30 minutes ago
Last year ' s exports from the Smole region increased

The Smolen Customs has recorded an increase in demand for seeds and tissues. The volume of goods delivered abroad is comparable to that of five football fields.

Today, 14:10
Sergei Krukovsky was released from SIZO under subscription
Another 7 million criminal case on fraud in the middle of the pandemic has been issued under a non-exit subscription.
Today, 13:35
The Smolen Customs has handed over a humanitarian consignment to SSS participants
The Smolen Customs regularly assists the special military operation and the residents of Donbas. This time, the team participated in a charitable action to help the 144th Guardian Moto shooter of the Elnin Krasnomen...
Today, 12:59
In the Molene Lands, the construction and repair of medical facilities were reported.
Our region has received unprecedented federal funds with the support of the President. Renovated Red Cross, updated ambulance, rehabilitation and new clinic on the Queen, examples of upgrading the health sector...
Today, 12:37
Head Rosatom Alexei Lihacev awarded awards to " new co-sponsors " , active residents of atomic cities and employees of atomic enterprises
One-name contest for the " New Creator " was attended by 1,178 people, supported by more than 100,000 people in the popular vote.

Today, 12:23
Plus 182 medics. Developments in the Smole region
The involvement of staff in the health sector was addressed through direct air, organized by CSD and the regional government.
Today, 11:48
In the Small Nuclear Power Plant, the repair of energy unit No. 3 with modernization components was completed before the target date.

With a reduction in the repair time of the 3rd energy unit, the SAES was able to produce an additional 22.6 million kWh of electricity


Today, 11:47
Smolin went to a colony for smuggling a strategic resource.
A man forged documents and drove over 20 tons of trout across the border.
Today, 11:12
In Smolen province, annual measles vaccines are delivered
The CSD, together with the Government of the Smole region and the Regional Directorate of the Rosbandsor, broadcast live on the development of the health sector.
Today, 09:53
Vasili Anohin: a project has been developed to build a new school in the Smolen district
Following a working visit to the municipality and a meeting with local residents, the Governor described the development of the area.
Today, 9:20
One of Smolenska's crossroads will turn off the lights.

The information was shared by the Regional Ministry of Transport with reference to the REDD-FM.

Today, 08:03
Silvana owes her daughter almost 1.8 million roubles.

There's a criminal case against a bad alimony. Re-establishment of justice has been helped by the Smole court.

Yesterday, 23:09
As a result of the National Project, the Smole province business received support of almost 9.9 billion roubles.
Small and medium-sized business in the Smole region received financial support in 2023 from a national project entitled " Small and medium-sized enterprise " , amounting to almost 9.9 billion roubles.
yesterday, 22:35
"The stronger the rear, the stronger the front." The bells continue to help the landers on the front.
In the run-up to Father's Day, we are talking about those who, despite everything, help the fighters in the SVR area.
yesterday, 21:58
The Smolenian musician became the winner of the entire Russian competition in Moscow.

This was reported to the Regional Centre Administration. A student at the M.A. Balaquirew Children ' s Arts School has become a winner of the competition in the capital.

yesterday, 21:20
My dad is a hero!
Young men were filming videos, writing essays and poems about their fathers, members of a special military operation.
yesterday, 20:42.
The post office schedule will be changed in the Smole region
It's about Father's Day.
yesterday, 20:05
Senator RF Artem Malachenkov has been invited to the Smolen province of Alexander Karelina
Sportsman is coming in spring to discuss cooperation in the region.
yesterday, 19:27
The Court released the deputy of the Smolene Goss Board, Vladimir Burduli, under the subscription of non-resident
According to RP, it cooperates actively with the investigation.
yesterday, 18:51
Work on the improvement of public territories in Smallenska begins on 1 March
The head of the city of Alexander Novik reported it.
